Title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy Tips & Override for Outlook Mobile
Description:
Outlook Mobile now supports Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy tips, helping users avoid accidental data leaks. When sensitive content is detected, users are alerted with inline tips or pop-ups, based on admin-configured rules. This update aligns DLP behavior across all Outlook clients for consistent compliance enforcement.
GA date: July CY2025
